Reviews.Title: Solid picture and sound
Reviews.Author: Ty
Reviews.Content: Im a exclusive front projection guy so this is my first and only led/lcd, this is just 720p as its impossible to find this size in 1080p (reasonably priced).  Happy with the hitachi's  picture and sound and it serves faithfully as a back-up display in a theater room.  Bigger brighter and obviously higher rez, it much better than my 9" audio vox and 7.5" artec I attempted in that location previously.  Only beef is the inability to remove unused inputs from the internal menu, five total but Im only using two so changing inputs results in more button presses.  I wont be using the internal tuner so cant comment on its performance.  I recommend this tv until 1080p is reasonably priced and available in this size...

Reviews.Title: Excellent Value
Reviews.Author: S. C. Watts "SCWatts"
Reviews.Content: Fantastic TV for the price. It's incredibly light and I'll be hanging this on the wall of my travel trailer. Great picture. Can't help but contrast this with the 19" Sony TV I personally imported on a trip back from Japan in 1983, a steal then at $400. Uh, this one's better . . . .

Reviews.Title: Audio out jack is not of regular type
Reviews.Author: michael b. marogil
Reviews.Content: I like the picture and sound on this TV which I use in my exercise room.  But I have not been able to connect my earphones to the audio out jack on the back of the TV because this jack is of a type called "digital coaxial" which it appears is not customary.

Reviews.Title: Great little TV
Reviews.Author: Daniel Haworth "Flechmen Foxwood"
Reviews.Content: I found this little TV on sale for $80 one day, and I picked it up because it had just what I was looking for.All I really wanted was a monitor that could take HDMI, VGA, and composite inputs. This shines on all fronts.It's small and lightweight, easily transportable to a friend's house for a night of gaming. It's so light, I just sat it on top of a cardboard box for a stand and it was perfectly fine.If you do run a computer through it, from VGA or HDMI, it works best at 1366x768. Xbox 360 sees it as 720p, and with the Xbox running it at the 720p resolution looks just fine. I got some anomalies in the picture when I tried running the Xbox at 1366x768, even though this seems to be the resolution the PC works best at.The tuner works alright, I plugged a little passive antenna into it, and it picks up all of the local stations with the expected digital quality.The controls on the front can be a little weird. Sometimes they're non-responsive unless you drag your finger across them. Not a big deal really, the remote works perfectly.The sound leaves a lot to be desired for, considering the thing has basically two laptop speakers facing downwards. It gets you by in a pinch, but I'd highly recommend you plug your headphones into the headphone hole on the left side.Aside from the sound, I really can't complain about this little TV. It works great, looks great, and the price is cheap. If all you need is a little TV that can take a variety of inputs, this is it.

Reviews.Title: Good price
Reviews.Author: hammy46
Reviews.Content: I like it for the size and price picture quality is good and the sound is fine so this is my rating .

Reviews.Title: Right size TV
Reviews.Author: Will R
Reviews.Content: Nice tv.  Fits the spot I bought it for perfectly.  Good picture quality and the features I needed.  If you need a small TV for a tight spot this works well.

Reviews.Title: be carefull
Reviews.Author: franklin p.
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV from the seller STL PRO, Inc., but when I opened the box, surprise, surprise, not new had many signs that had been used previously. The remote control came without batteries and screen previously been cleaned, had signs of fluid or water. In the back of the TV had two tv model labels when I take one of the labels had one below with another model tv. I find this model online and just said it was refurbished.Do not trust this seller (STL PRO, Inc.), he says that the tv is brand new and sealed box, false. Tv is used or refurbished. I live in Dominican Republic and is more expensive for me to return the tv.
